physical_appearance:The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. It features a lady and a child. They are sitting closely beside one another. Both of them are wearing dresses and the lady adorns multiple jewellery and wears a headress. The child seems to be whispering to the lady
 who is leaning slightly over to listen to her. The background of the photograph suggests that this was taken in the interior of a building.
